verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> spake יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> unto Baruch בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵֽרִיָּ֑ה <S%H5374><s%> of Neriah בְּכָתְבוֹ֩ <S%H3789><s%> when he had written אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֨ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> in a book מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> at the mouth יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֧ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> unto בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <S%H1263><s%> unto thee O Baruch

אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Thou didst say אֽוֹי־ <S%H188><s%> Woe נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Ah לִ֔י כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָסַ֧ף <S%H3254><s%> hath added יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> is me now for the LORD יָג֖וֹן <S%H3015><s%> grief עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto מַכְאֹבִ֑י <S%H4341><s%> to my sorrow יָגַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3021><s%> I fainted בְּאַנְחָתִ֔י <S%H585><s%> in my sighing וּמְנוּחָ֖ה <S%H4496><s%> no rest לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no מָצָֽאתִי׃ <S%H4672><s%> and I find ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹּאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus shalt thou say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him The LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what בָּנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1129><s%> thus Behold [that] which I have built אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am הֹרֵ֔ס <S%H2040><s%> will I break down וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and what נָטַ֖עְתִּי <S%H5193><s%> and that which I have planted אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am נֹתֵ֑שׁ <S%H5428><s%> I will pluck up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> is the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> even this whole land הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> are you תְּבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> And seekest לְךָ֥ גְדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> thou great things אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּבַקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H1245><s%> for thyself? seek כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> I am going מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> [them] not for behold I will bring רָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> upon all flesh נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> will I give לְךָ֤ אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <S%H5315><s%> but thy life לְשָׁלָ֔ל <S%H7998><s%> unto thee for a prey עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> in כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <S%H4725><s%> in all places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תֵּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> along שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it ס
